citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The 6 month interval between the last two IACUC semi annual reports to the Institutional Official was exceeded by 3
months. The 6 month interval facilitates the timely reporting of facility issues to ensure institutional support. The facility
must ensure that the reports to the Institutional Official are made at a 6 month interval.

The last review of the contingency plan occurred in May 16, 2023, more than a year previous to the date of this inspection
on August 29, 2024. The annual review and documentation of review ensures that contingency planning incorporates
facility changes and new resources for the management of emergency situations. The facility must ensure that the plan is
reviewed and the review documented on an annual basis.
Correct by October, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
